title.rendered: Uluc Morek | Marine Engineer | Naval Architect

content.rendered:
Uluc is a qualified Naval Architect and Marine Engineer and he has significant experience of working within shipyards on major repairs of all types of vessels and of conversion projects. Experienced in conducting Hull and Machinery damage surveys, various Marine Warranty surveys, JH143 risk assessment surveys, drydock repairs and IACS/SOLAS regulations, Uluc specializes in technical investigations, consultancy and ship repairs.

Discipline: Engineer / Naval Architect
Specialism: Accident investigation and casualty management
Expert Witness Expertise: Investigations, expert opinions

Contact

Istanbul | +90 530 445 1886
